name: BODY JUMPER
description:
⚠️DEMO VERSION ⚠️

Play the frist two chapters of BODY JUMPER -  two additional chapters are still in planning/development. I appreciate feedback :)

This game deals with my own experiences of dysphoria and the hard part of accepting your transness
but it's also heavily influenced by the album Body Jumper by Provoker:

“We thought about it playing out like a movie, where some guy is trying to escape his problems by going into a program that transports his consciousness,” said Petty. “He can jump around into a bunch of different lives, but throughout this experience he has to deal with the same problems that he was dealing with before.” ...

I (mostly) made this in my free time while i was waiting for therapy - so beware of mental illness. 🪱->🧠

content warnings for : anxiety, depression, gender dysphoria, alcohol and drug abuse, physical abuse
